channel.title: Can we use more than one Tor browser?
channel.description: Since the Tor browser is portable can we use more than one version of the Tor browser. Is it safe?

item.description:

item.title: Can we use more than one Tor browser?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Simon707

Could you clarify your question. Do you mean:

  • Using two different versions of Tor Browser ( i.e Tor Browser 7.5 and Tor Browser 0.3.1.8 ) ?
  • Using more than one instance of Tor Browser in Whonix ?

Read full topic
